author: chris vann
comment: Spot on well worth 50p

author: Eric M
comment: I love this watch face. However significant battery drain on Nougat 7.1 with a pixel. I had to change watch faces and the battery drain is gone. Hope this can be fixed soon! This is my favorite
title: Retro

author: Etta Smit
comment: Love it
title: Mr

author: Porky Hontas
comment: Nice

author: William Nelson
comment: This is the face I use as my default on my ZenWatch 2.  I try different faces all the time but this gives the info I want most and is very easy to see without my readers, especially with ability to customize colors.
title: Excellent!

author: Daniel Du
comment: If can add the step count display, that would be perfect !!!
title: Very Nice

author: christiaan van gaal
comment: Use it everyday. Low energy and great when dimmed on my Sony smartwatch 3.
title: Low energy

author: Nicholas S. Castellano
comment: Very nice digital watch face.  Displays both batteries.  The display is simple and uncluttered, making it easy to read at a glance.  Unfortunately, it burns through my watch's battery in a few hours, so I can't use it.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you please tell us about your situation more in detail.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Gene Fish
comment: I have several watch faces, but this is one of my favorites.
title: Gene Fish

author: tech jk
comment: Great watch face for the sony smartwatch 3 good battery aswell

author: Indrapal Sharma
comment: Very good and useful
title: Love the design

author: Janie Pfeffer
comment: This is awesome and you can customize it to look good with any color watchband.

author: ronald canham
comment: Great
title: A41

author: Maff Mace
comment: Great watch face, developer also adds suggestions, great customer service. Used this face since it was released and never had the desire to change it.
title: Great

author: Dennis Moser
comment: My favorite watch face!

author: Hernan Jr
comment: Beautiful

author: Tom Iansiti
comment: 5-stars when I can adjust the ambient mode below 51% without screen blanking out (ASUS Zenwatch) and we can get a steps option, maybe in the 'year' or phone battery field. Otherwise, just what I was looking for.
title: Very nice, almost perfect

author: Jason Fauth
comment: This app will not work with my gear live. It shows my watch as not connected.  I wrote the authors email and never got a response in 30 days.
title: No support

author: John Montgomery
comment: One of the better more informative retro LCD type faces. Would also like to see color options like they have on some of their other faces.
title: Good

author: Jack Carlson
comment: All on one screen. Like this a lot.
title: All the info I need regularly

author: Ben Haylock
comment: Excellent watch face. Battery drains a little faster, but is normal for a running app.

author: Shawn Demers
comment: Love the colors!
title: Great watchface!

author: Richard Olsson
comment: 5 stars if following things get taken care of: using a ZenWatch, there's an issue with ambient light mode where if I select anything below 51% the screen goes black (not sure why this function is necessary since the android wear should dim based on watch settings) anyway, next: would be great to be able to choose date format, anything past that would just be great bonus things like, steps, weather, etc thanks for a great watch face :)
title: Almost perfect
